website_summaries.verdict: This set includes domes, wheel bases, and other unusual shapes that other brands don't.
pros: 100-piece assortment of tiles, figures, and wheel bases
Includes domes and other unusual shapes that most competitors don't
Interior lattice plastic strips and rivets help avoid cracks
cons: More than a dozen of the pieces are not building pieces, but instead are plastic figurines

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but other similar sets may be better
customer_reviews.text: The "100" piece" designation is a bit misleading. 16 of them are small plastic shapes, I think meant to represent people, which have no magnets. And overall, there's a much higher proportion of smaller pieces than in other sets. Yes, the box is bigger than other 100-piece sets -- there's a lot of air inside. The magnets are a bit weaker than in other sets, but adequate. On the plus side, it has some different shapes: 2 vehicle bases, large hexagons and half-hexagons, four domes. I would start with another set, then if you want to expand, add this. The several brands I've found have small size differences, but can be used together.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - hours of fun and creativity!
customer_reviews.text: We've had a set of these Stick N Stack magnets for over 2 years now. They have held up perfectly (absolutely no damage, and the kids are not usually gentle with them). They have provided so many hours of creative fun we just ordered our kids this expansion pack. The magnets are great for all my kids - Age 2 to 7, both sexes. When we first got them I was afraid they were too easily knocked apart, but the kids rarely have an issue with it. Literally HOURS of fun for our family! These are a top toy in our house, and I just love the level of creativity the kids have with them! A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to a basic set, definitely makes building more fun. Most popular with this set for both of my kids (2 and 4 year old) have been using car bases to build cars, trains and other crazy looking vehicles. To my surprise, both of my kids also loved little people. The only negative about this set is that smaller parts: L- shaped and rectangles do not stick to each other as well as regular parts such as squares and triangles. Overall great set, awesome for kids and for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Ratner

customer_reviews.title: Fun extension pack, weak magnets.
customer_reviews.text: There are many specialty pieces. Ithis is a good extension pack. However the magnets are very weak. It immediately conflicts with the ability to enjoy the variety. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paradyse

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: We had bought only 32 pieces at first and my almost 3 year old daughter loves playing with them, so I decided to buy the 100 piece and she has such a good time with them! I actually enjoy playing with them with her sometimes, also. I'm hoping after writing this review I will get some structure ideas per the pamphlet in the box. Great fun for kids of all ages!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha B. Rush

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these magnetic tiles
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these magnetic tiles! My favorite thing about them is how easy they are to clean! My daughter (and her friends) love to incorporate other toys into the creations they build! There are so many pieces in this set and we also have other sets too, so there is more than enough to share! My daughter also practices her colors with these tiles, which I love! These tiles are so versatile and have so many uses! We love them and can't say enough good things about them! I would highly recommend them to anyone with children!
customer_reviews.author: Tim & Krista

customer_reviews.title: The magnets are very weak - don't even hold to themselves
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, I was extremely excited to give these to my children this Christmas. The unique shapes promised for even more endless fun for them. But I was very disappointed in the magnet quality. They barely stick to each other and the children can't build with them like they can with their other brand of similar magnet toys. And ours are off brand and are still much stronger than these. Very disappointed and I would NOT recommend these to a friend - as a matter of fact, I've encouraged friends that have other brands NOT to get these.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Very good addition to the collection
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product today and my 5-year old was thrilled to see the new and interesting set. We already have the basic set from Playmags. These tiles work very well with our old set. I'm certainly very happy with this choice, The reason for one start off is because I didn't receive the same set I ordered, although both sets belong to the "deluxe" category. So the buyers should be aware that what you ordered might not be what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Tsai

customer_reviews.title: My kids absolutely love this stick and stack set
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this stick and stack set! Its so much fun for all of them and even myself included. There isn't a limit to what we can make with this set really. Can even make a bowl and it sticks together because of the magnets. Don't have to worry about it going down like normal wooden blocks do. Gravity is no longer and issue. My daughters love to stick and pull them apart. My son loves to make little buildings and scenes to expand his imagination. I love when there are fun durable learning toys out there. My children are learning and building their selves without even realizing it. That's the genius of this item!
customer_reviews.author: LadyReviews4fun

customer_reviews.title: Magnablocks are a little better quality. The 4 star is because some of ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves these. Magnablocks are a little better quality. The 4 star is because some of the blocks don't fit together because of magnet poles, magnablocks does not have that problem. This set works with other magnet type blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Gift to Keep Little Minds Being Creative !!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this set and so will yours. First of all ,if you own the Magna-tile brand, they complement them and work well together. I have a 4, 6 , and 9 year old and they all have fun being creative with the pieces. Since there are 100 pieces there are enough for everyone to share. They are magnetic so a breeze to clean up . I also purchased the book which gives the kids additional creative ideas of things to make. It keeps them busy for hours during rainy ,cold days. I highly recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: So these are pretty cool. I was really excited with the variety ...
customer_reviews.text: So these are pretty cool. I was really excited with the variety of colors and pieces it came with. The little people and car are super cute. The box is really nice that it comes in and you can restore them in it. The colors are vibrant and great for kiddos to help learn their colors and shapes. All around great gift for kids or yourself. =)
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: ... had this for a few months and it's really great. We have the one that has bus and ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a few months and it's really great. We have the one that has bus and becomes a train and my young son (now 5) will play for it for hours. I have another set from another company and he likes both. Just to let you know 100 is still NOT enough pieces. My husband also love to play with it as well! It's great tool for the growing mind as well as for adults!
customer_reviews.author: ILS

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for all children
customer_reviews.text: This was the 3rd year in a row we have bought different sets of these They entertain and challenge the mind of children teaching them shapes at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Salley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with inferior/broken product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my preschool as a Christmas gift that would be given to the class. Unfortunately, I did not open the box until the 30 day return period had passed. One of the car bases -new, out of the box has a broken wheel. It is not repairable. This is very disappointing. Lesson learned, inspect the contents of your package if you are going to hold it for a gift for later. I have purchased other magnet sets. I am not impressed with the quality of this one. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: HockingSuz

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable for Mom AND Kids!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about the Magnetic Stick N Stack line! We own several sets and my now 4 year-old son lives them (as donI—I could build all day)! It is a satisfactory way for a toddler plus to construct (those pieces just snap together so we’ll-no frustration trying to fit them together)! We’ll be buying more as the years go on, I’m sure!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to other sets!
customer_reviews.text: We already have a starter set of shapes, and our boys got this for Christmas in addition. They love all the different types of shapes in this one, and immediately set out to make a giant castle. We also love the little figures. "It's fun!" my 4-yr.-old says, :-)
customer_reviews.author: J. Harms

customer_reviews.title: So many great pieces to add to your magnetic stick 'N stack ...
customer_reviews.text: So many great pieces to add to your magnetic stick 'N stack or magna tile collections. My kids ages 2-13 enjoyed making creative structures with all the different type of pieces. My 3 year old especially enjoyed the cars with all the people.
customer_reviews.author: gr

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Hands down our favorite toy. We play almost every day with these. We got our first set 3 years ago. Super durable super fun. We have bought bigger sets so we can build more things. Best toy ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy to get creative
customer_reviews.text: My son absutely loves his shape mags. This is the second set as he’s been playing with a smallernset for 6 months! These tiles don’t get old in this house. They’re great to inspire him and he spends hours building castles, ships, towers, houses...

customer_reviews.title: Playtime is so much fun. My son loves playing with these magnetic peices
customer_reviews.text: Playtime is so much fun. My son loves playing with these magnetic peices. It's colorful design is great for learning the colors and some shapes. I will say that I probably should have waited as I bought it for my 2 year old and the recommended age is 3 years old which I agree. He is getting better at stacking them but was extremely frustrated in the beginning.

customer_reviews.title: Tons of pieces
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 6 year old girl and 10 year old son. They absolutely loved it! There were many different pieces that each of them could create their own masterpiece. They are easy to build with and stick to each other very well. The colors are vivid and the product is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maura Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of unusual shapes
customer_reviews.text: Nice big set with great pieces. My 7 year old was happy to get this for his birthday. A great addition to his basic set. The people are not magnetic but are a good size and quality.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: these magna tiles are a hit with both our 4 and 9 yo. Great quality and sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome addition to our 2 sets of Magna-tiles (although I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome addition to our 2 sets of Magna-tiles (these tiles fit perfectly and work just as good; even the thickness is exactly the same, although some other reviewers noted otherwise). Kids especially loved the arches and 1/4 circle segments. We also got 12-by-3s, and they are heavily used as well. Will definitely buy more from this brand.

customer_reviews.title: These are a great addition to our set
customer_reviews.text: We have had the Magnatiles for a year and my kids played with them almost everyday. These are a great addition to our set. I love the different shapes and the wheels. Of course, as soon as I gave them this set they decided to take a break from the Magnatiles but I'm sure when they get back into them they will enjoy the added options this set gives them.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and the fence pieces and domes are great.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got this additional set,cool pieces I did not have before.

customer_reviews.title: i love this product

customer_reviews.title: Great combination of blocks and the quality of the magnets ...
customer_reviews.text: Great combination of blocks and the quality of the magnets holds well the creations and the children love to play with these and are engaged a fair amount of time when they play with these. However, these models in the pictures shown will not be that easy to assemble by those younger than 4.
customer_reviews.author: Morena

customer_reviews.title: This set has been great. There are many new shapes and it enables ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the magnetic tiles so much, he purchased this set with his own money. He was so anxious to play with it, he kept checking the tracking number to see when it would be delivered. This set has been great. There are many new shapes and it enables my son to be more creative. It is compatible with our magna-tiles set which is great! One of the tiles was missing a magnet, and customer service was awesome! They responded right away and sent a replacement quickly. I definitely recommend this set and brand.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. These are the only Xmas gifts they continue to play with. Very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter (5) loves these, they do work together with her other (Magnatile brand) set, and they add interest with different shapes, curves, wheels, and people to the set. Would definitely buy these again to expand the set, and these would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Aren

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (ages 6 and 3) are loving this set! The magnets stick together really well and are really sturdy. There are a bunch of different shapes, not just the standard square/triangles, etc. We've been able to build a lot of things with this set and they're looking forward to building a a lot more with them. I recommend this set as an alternative to other magnet sets, it's a much better value and you can easily expand the set.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love magnetic stick n stack!! The kids get hours and hours of play from these sets. This set in particular is a great add on to the basic set. The domes, arches, and fences allow them to add some architectural flair to their creations. Customer service is also amazing. We had a minor issue with one of the pieces and it was promptly replaced. It is so nice to see a company stand behind their product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. All pieces stay together, you can build very high constructions. I bought 100 pieces set as an addition to our existing 60 pieces set and now we can build anything we want.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality blocks! Great variety and new style to add to our older set. Completely matches the Magrific/Cra-Z-Art magnet blocks that we already had. Immediately occupied my 6 year old on Christmas morning-for a while.

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful to play with
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful to play with, however, using them in a classroom of 4-5 year olds, after a couple weeks I have 3 broken wheels. So, I was disappointed that they didn't with stand what I needed, But the blocks get played with EVERY SINGLE DAY!!!! So I am happy with the purchase

They can build many shapes and imagine more and more coz they enjoy their work for a longer time than other puzzles abd blocks! We love it! And the most important thing is the high quality material!

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea!

customer_reviews.text: I bough these for my 3 years old, however, my 8 and 10 year old play with them as well. Much better price then magna tiles, but just as good of quality

product_meta.title: Magnetic Stick N Stack 100 Piece Deluxe Shape Magnetic Tiles 3D Construction Building Blocks Award Winning STEM Educational Accessories Set with 18 Different Shapes and 16 Figures
feature_bullets: Set Includes:100 pieces total – Assortment of Magnetic Tiles – Figures – Wheel basis
Clear transparent tiles in never before seen shapes – Tiles are not meant to be build on top of dome
Encourages creativity & Play - Enriches children's imagination - Educational & Fun
Same top quality tiles of Magnetic Stick N’ Stack pieces – Ideal for school & Homes
Fully compatible with other brands - Safety tested & approved - Great addition to any set you already own!
